body.p:
413
May 20th 4
Geo P. Appleton Esq
Suncook. N. H.
Sir

Your communication of the 1st inst to his Excellency Gov Bramlette, has been referred to me for reply. Commissions are only issued to those who recruit the requisite number of men to entitle them to the position they apply for. I return your recommendation as it may be of use to you in future.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky.
